item.title: World’s First Autonomous Car Race Held at Abu Dhabi’s Yas Marina
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Can you imagine a car race without any drivers? Well, it’s no longer imagination, but a reality now! That’s right, the world witnessed the first-ever professional autonomous car race over the weekend. The Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL) held at Yas Marina marked a significant leap in the motor racing world. With autonomous cars […]
item.content:encoded:
Can you imagine a car race without any drivers? Well, it’s no longer imagination, but a reality now! That’s right, the world witnessed the first-ever professional autonomous car race over the weekend. The Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL) held at Yas Marina marked a significant leap in the motor racing world. With autonomous cars […]

The post World’s First Autonomous Car Race Held at Abu Dhabi’s Yas Marina appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Gecko by Google: Pioneering the Next Generation of Text Embedding Models
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Welcome to the world of text embeddings where text is converted into numbers! This world has recently been turned around by the distillation of large language models (LLMs) into efficient and compact forms. Google’s latest innovation, Gecko, is the lastest advancement in this technology, revolutionizing the way we handle textual data. This article explores […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction Welcome to the world of text embeddings where text is converted into numbers! This world has recently been turned around by the distillation of large language models (LLMs) into efficient and compact forms. Google’s latest innovation, Gecko, is the lastest advancement in this technology, revolutionizing the way we handle textual data. This article explores […]

The post Gecko by Google: Pioneering the Next Generation of Text Embedding Models appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Convert Blurry Videos to HD with Adobe’s New AI
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Adobe’s latest innovation in AI technology, VideoGigaGAN, promises to revolutionize video upscaling by enhancing resolution without compromising on quality. With its new approach, Adobe aims to address the longstanding challenges of blurry videos. It presents a solution that offers remarkable results in converting blurry videos into HD. Let’s find out more about its features and […]
item.content:encoded:
Adobe’s latest innovation in AI technology, VideoGigaGAN, promises to revolutionize video upscaling by enhancing resolution without compromising on quality. With its new approach, Adobe aims to address the longstanding challenges of blurry videos. It presents a solution that offers remarkable results in converting blurry videos into HD.
